title: [K-12] Mobile-Based Gain Instructional Design Model Applied Health Education Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Health Terminology and Digital Device Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: Provision of personalized mobile content for learners and application of the Gain Model's nine-stage framework

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain health education content at over 80% proficiency through the 9-step instructional method of the Gain Model in mobile environments.
Learners can retain over 70% of core health education concepts two months after training.
Learners can achieve a satisfaction score of 4 or higher (on a 5-point scale) for mobile-based learning methods.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
